= QISlider

QISlider is an advanced javascript slider based on jquery with touch functionality. The sliders
were developed for http://www.energytransitionmodel.com/.  

= Usage
See pkg/qi-slider-0.0.1/index.html for more information and usage.


= Development
Make sure: 
  * SASS/HAML is installed
  * Sprockets is installed
  * Rake is installed
  
To make a new version: 
  
  rake build
  

  
  
Check out how they work:
http://dennisschoenmakers.github.com/qislider
